Body:
Description: When running the AD_ActivityCollection job it is failing with access denied error. We have checked the documents about setting this up and we think it is setup correctly
Requires Netwrix Activity Monitor (SAM) API Access
Requires Read access to the SAM Log Archive location

We are not sure why this is failing

The product is actual Enterprise Auditor.

Reassigning case to the appropriate team.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Ian Ranstrom, Jason Skidmore

Steps to Reproduce Updated: Run AD-ActivityCollection Job.
Job fails with access error.

What We've Learned Updated: AD_ActivityCollection Job was not setup to import logs from anywhere. 
We copied the settings for the share that was being pulled from in the prod environment as the AD server is the same for both environments.
Next Steps Updated: Awaiting jobs to run overnight and approval to close.
